title: MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White) | 18.11 x 11.61 x 21.26 Inch
descriptions:
Product Listing:

Introducing the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage, the Awesome Arcade Hamster Home in White. This spacious and versatile hamster cage is perfect for providing a comfortable and stimulating environment for your furry friend.

Product Details:
- Dimensions: Length: 18.11 inches, Width: 11.61 inches, Height: 21.26 inches
- Weight: 6.1 pounds
- Color: White

Included Accessories:
- Exercise wheel
- Water bottle
- Food bowl
- Nesting nook
- Interior play tubes

Features:
- Multi-level play space for your hamster to explore and play
- Deep base for bedding, ensuring a cozy and comfortable habitat
- Top door access for easy cleaning and handling
- Removable upper cover for convenient access to your hamster
- Modular design for customization and expansion
- Connector pieces for easy connection to standard play tubes

Assembly:
- No tools required for assembly, making setup quick and hassle-free

Warranty:
- Manufacturer's warranty for a period of 1 year, ensuring the quality and durability of the product

Provide your hamster with the ultimate home with the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage. Order now and give your furry friend a comfortable and interactive living space.

Product Listing:

Introducing the MidWest Homes for Pets Hamster Cage | Awesome Arcade Hamster Home (White)! This spacious and stylish hamster cage is the perfect home for your furry friend. With its multi-level play space and deep base for bedding, your hamster will have plenty of room to explore and play.

The dimensions of this hamster cage are 18.11 inches in length, 11.61 inches in width, and 21.26 inches in height. It weighs 6.1 pounds, making it lightweight and easy to move around. The cage comes in a sleek white color, adding a touch of elegance to any room.

Included with the cage are essential accessories to ensure your hamster's comfort and entertainment. These accessories include an exercise wheel, water bottle, food bowl, nesting nook, and interior play tubes. Your hamster will never be bored with these fun and interactive features.

The cage features a modular design with connector pieces, allowing you to customize the layout to suit your hamster's needs. The top door access makes it easy to clean and maintain the cage. The upper cover is removable, providing easy access to your hamster and making it convenient for cleaning or adding new bedding.

Assembly of this hamster cage is a breeze, as no tools are required. Simply follow the included instructions, and your hamster will have a new home in no time.

Rest assured, this product comes with a 1-year warranty for your peace of mind. The warranty is provided by the manufacturer, ensuring high-quality and reliable craftsmanship.
